description: NASA has unveiled its 2025 astronaut class, selecting 10 candidates from over 8,000 applicants. For the first time, women make up the majority. Their training will prepare them for missions to the ISS, Artemis lunar exploration, and ultimately crewed missions to Mars, supporting NASA’s bold long-term spaceflight goals.
title: NASA Selects 10 New Astronauts to Support Future Moon and Mars Missions

description: The Redmi 15 5G aims to change the fortunes of the Xiaomi subsidiary, which has been losing ground in India when it comes to shipments. Consequently, the handset packs an interesting set of features and specifications. Its USPs are the 7,000mAh battery and an almost phablet-sized screen, although the handset isn’t without its compromises. But does the Redmi 15 5G impress enough?
title: Redmi 15 5G Review: A Big, Bulky, Battery Monster

description: New research confirms the Silverpit Crater in the North Sea was formed by an asteroid impact around 43 million years ago. Using seismic imaging and rare mineral evidence, scientists proved the impact origin beyond doubt, resolving a debate that lasted two decades and placing the crater among Earth’s rare, well-preserved impact structures.
title: Scientists Confirm Ancient Asteroid Impact Created North Sea’s Silverpit Crater 43 Million Years Ago

description: Astronomers report that Comet C/2025 R2 (SWAN), discovered in September, may brighten to near naked-eye visibility in October.
title: Comet C/2025 R2 (SWAN) Might Become Visible to the Naked Eye in October: Here's What We Know
Flipkart Billion Days: Upgrade Your Home with Premium Soundbars and Smart Locks

description: Oppo A6 Pro 4G has been launched in Vietam with a 6.57-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, 240Hz touch sampling, and up to 1,400 nits peak brightness, protected by AGC DT-Star D+ glass. It is powered by a MediaTek Helio G100 chip with 8GB RAM and up to 256GB storage, running ColorOS 15 on Android 15. The phone has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, a 16-megapixel front camera, a 7,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging, SuperCool VC system, AI GameBoost 2.0, IP69-rated build, and an in-display fingerprint sensor.
title: Oppo A6 Pro 4G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 7,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Features

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 opened to all users on September 23, bringing discounts, bank offers, and exchange deals across a wide range of products. Alongside smartphones, tablets, TVs, and appliances from leading brands, Amazon is also offering major price cuts on its in-house Echo devices and Fire TV units, making this sale an ideal time to buy them.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Amazon Fire TV Stick, Echo Show and More

description: China’s securities regulator has informally instructed brokerages to halt their real-world asset tokenisation activities in Hong Kong, according to a Reuters report. The move signals Beijing’s cautious stance on risk management, even as Hong Kong accelerates its digital-asset ambitions with new licensing frameworks and regulatory roadmaps. Analysts suggest the pause is a temporary cooling-off period rather than a reversal of demand, with several firms already active in launching tokenised bonds and yield-bearing products.
title: CSRC Directs Brokers to Pause Real-World Asset Tokenisation Activity in Hong Kong

description: TPV has launched three new Philips Audio products in India, including the TWS Earbuds TAT1269, Bluetooth Speaker TAS3400, and Party Speaker TAX4910. The TAT1269 earbuds feature Bluetooth 5.4, 13mm drivers, IPX5 water resistance,  up to 40 hours of playback, and touch controls. The TAS3400 speaker delivers 40W sound, RGB lighting, multiple connectivity options, IPX5 splash resistance, and 10-hour claimed battery life. The TAX4910 party speaker offers 120W output, dual 6.5-inch woofers, True Wireless pairing, party lights, dual mic inputs, and a 10-hour claimed battery life.
title: Philips TAT1269 TWS Headset Launched in India Alongside Bluetooth and Party Speakers: Price, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 has been silently launched in India in two colour options. It comes with an 8.7-inch screen and a 5,100mAh battery. It has an 8-megapixel rear camera and a 5-megapixel front-facing camera. The Galaxy Tab A11 succeed the Galaxy Tab A9, which was unveiled in 2023. It offers a 3.5mm audio jack.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 With 8.7-Inch Display, 5,100mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 started at midnight on Monday for Prime members, going live for others today. The sale brings great deals on electronics, like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, smart TVs, PCs, and laptops. Apart from direct price cuts, the e-commerce giant is also providing additional discounts with credit and debit cards of select banks.
title: Top Smartphone Deals Under Rs. 25,000 During Amazon Sale 2025: OnePlus Nord 4, iQOO Neo 10R, Samsung Galaxy A55 and More

description: If you're shopping for a new Wi-Fi router, then the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale offers great deals on a wide range of routers for a variety of use cases. You can find new wireless routers with fast connectivity, extended range, and other features during the ongoing Amazon Great Indian Festival sale. You can purchase them at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Wi-Fi Routers from D-Link, TP-Link, Tenda, and More Brands

description: Facebook Dating is introducing two new features to improve users’ matchmaking experience. The Meta-owned service, launched in 2019 within the Facebook app, will now include an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant that suggests tailored profiles based on user prompts. In addition, a new blind date-style feature, Meet Cute, has been added to help users connect in a more spontaneous way.
title: Facebook Dating Brings an AI Assistant to Help Users Find Prompt-Based Matches

description: iQOO 15 will debut with a 6.85-inch 2K Samsung Everest Display featuring 2K LEAD OLED technology and Samsung’s M14 luminescent material. Vivo Labs reports the screen offers 40 percent higher luminous efficiency, 44 percent lower power use, 50 percent longer lifespan, and 60 percent less smearing than its predecessor. The display will deliver up to 6,000 nits peak brightness, 144Hz refresh rate, 3,200Hz touch response rate, 8T LTPO, ultra-low motion blur, TÜV certifications, Eye Comfort 2.0, and ultra-dim mode.
title: iQOO 15 to Feature 2K Samsung 'Everest' Display With M14 Luminescent Material

description: LinkedIn is updating its terms to begin collecting user data from November 3 to train its artificial intelligence (AI) models. The professional networking platform confirmed that profile details and public posts will be used, while private messages will remain excluded. Some data will also be shared with Microsoft and affiliates for targeted ads, though users in select regions can opt out.
title: LinkedIn Wants to Train AI Models on User Data, But This One Step Stops It

description: Samsung The Movingstyle has been launched in Korea with a price tag of KRW 14,90,000 (roughly Rs. 96,000). It features a 27-inch touch screen with support for 120Hz refresh rate. It runs on a second-generation AI 4K processor and the Tizen Smart TV operating system. The display offers speakers with 10W audio output. It supports Google Assistant and Bixby.
title: Samsung Launches Movingstyle Wireless Mobile Display With Detachable Touchscreen, Stand

description: Vivo V60 Lite 5G launched with MediaTek Dimensity 7360 Turbo chipset and a 6,500mAh battery. It comes in three different colour options and packs 12GB of RAM. It has a dual rear camera unit. It has an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance. It has a 32-megapixel front-facing camera. There's no word from Vivo on whether it plans to launch the Vivo V60 Lite 5G in other countries, including India.
title: Vivo V60 Lite 5G With 6,500mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 7360 Turbo SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale is now underway for all users in India. If budget TWS earphones are what you’re after, then the Amazon Great Indian Festival sale has something in store for you, too, with discounts of up to 75 percent on Bluetooth earphones. Apart from this, there are no-cost EMI options and Amazon Pay offers that can be used to further lower the effective sale price of the product.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Budget TWS Earphones from Boat, Realme and Other Brands

description: Origin OS 6, a user interface built on top of Android 16, will soon be released in India for Vivo and iQOO smartphones, a company executive has announced. The new user interface will replace the Funtouch OS 15 skin in the country, which is based on Android 15.
title: Origin OS 6 is Coming Soon to iQOO Phones in India, Confirmed to Replace Funtouch OS

description: The UAE has signed the Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement (MCAA) under the Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework (CARF), joining global efforts to automatically exchange cryptocurrency tax information. The framework will be implemented in 2027, with the first data sharing expected in 2028. Public consultation, running from September 15 to November 8, 2025, invites feedback from exchanges, custodians, traders, and advisory firms. The move aims to boost transparency, ensure tax compliance, and create a clear legal framework for investors.
title: UAE to Begin Sharing Crypto Tax Data Under Crypto Asset Reporting Framework in 2028

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is underway across India, offering shoppers attractive price cuts, exchange schemes, and extra coupons. Those looking to elevate their audio experience can explore a curated selection of top portable speaker deals from leading brands. SBI debit and credit card users can enjoy an additional 10 percent instant discount, while EMI plans, coupons, and exchange offers help bring prices down further. This roundup highlights the most appealing portable speaker offers available during the festive sale.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Speakers From Sony, JBL, Boat and More

description: India will become the first country to get the Search Live feature in AI Mode, Google confirmed. On Tuesday, the Mountain View-based tech giant said in a media briefing that the feature will soon arrive in the country, allowing users to make video-based real-time search queries via two-way conversations with the AI.
title: Google's Search Live in AI Mode Is Coming to India Soon After US-Exclusive Launch

description: Kojima Productions shared updates on its future projects at the Beyond the Strand livestream marking the 10th anniversary of the studio on Tuesday. The studio revealed a new trailer for OD, the horror game in development for Xbox Game Studios. Hideo Kojima also shared updates on PlayStation title, Physint; the Death Stranding movie; the Death Stranding animation project; and more.
title: Hideo Kojima Reveals New Trailer for Xbox Horror Game OD, Phil Spencer Says Development in 'Full Swing'

description: Realme GT 8 series, comprising the standard Realme GT 8 and the Realme GT 8 Pro, will be unveiled by the Chinese smartphone maker next month. The company recently teased the design of the Pro model on a social media platform. Now, a tipster has shared an alleged render of the phone, which reveals its rear design. The handset might carry a redesigned, square camera module on the back, housing three camera sensors.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Design Spotted in Leaked Render With a Redesigned Triple Rear Camera Module

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 sale opened for all shoppers on Tuesday. The discount sale, which started on Monday for Prime members exclusively, is expected to continue for a few more days. The e-commerce giant is offering lucrative deals on a wide range of smart TVs in this annual sale. Here, we've curated a list of the best deals on smart TVs with 50-inch screens.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on 50-Inch Smart TVs From Sony, Samsung and Xiaomi

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is live in India, offering attractive deals on home entertainment devices, including budget-friendly soundbars from top brands. Shoppers can enjoy significant discounts, and SBI cardholders receive an additional 10 percent instant discount. EMI plans, coupons, and exchange offers further reduce costs. This roundup highlights the best affordable soundbar deals, making it an ideal opportunity for customers looking to upgrade their audio setup during the festive sale.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Budget Soundbars From JBL, Boat, Portronics and More

description: Crypto markets extended their pullback on Tuesday as Bitcoin hovered at $112,900 (roughly Rs. 1.02 crore) and Ethereum at $4,193 (roughly Rs. 3.98 lakh). Heavy liquidations pushed most altcoins into the red, with Solana and BNB seeing deeper losses. Analysts note institutional accumulation and regulatory updates as key themes, while traders await Jerome Powell’s remarks on the economic outlook. Market sentiment remains cautious, with critical levels likely to decide whether this correction deepens or reverses.
title: Bitcoin Price Steadies at $112,900 Amidst Crypto Market Turmoil

description: Google announced on Monday that its Gemini assistant is now coming to Google TV, extending support beyond smartphones, tablets, wearables, and Workspace apps. Replacing Google Assistant, Gemini brings new AI-powered tools for easier content discovery and search while retaining existing voice functions. The update aims to make navigating the smart TV platform more intuitive and personalised.
title: Gemini for Google TV Launched With AI-Powered Recommendations and Search Features

description: Apple has released the iOS 26.1 Beta update for iPhone. It expands the number of languages which are supported by Apple Intelligence, including Danish, Dutch, and Norwegian. Apart from this, Live Translation for AirPods, which was announced at the ‘Awe Dropping’ event on September 9, will also reportedly benefit from more languages that work with the feature.
title: iOS 26.1 Beta 1 Update Expands Language Support for Apple Intelligence, AirPods Live Translation: Report

description: SpaceX successfully launched NROL-48 on Sept. 22, 2025, for the U.S. National Reconnaissance Office. The mission deployed small satellites into orbit, supporting the “proliferated architecture,” a strategy to boost resilience by using many small spacecraft for surveillance and intelligence.
title: SpaceX Boosts NROL-48 in Key U.S. Intelligence Mission

description: Xiaomi 17 series is going to debut in China later this month. The phones in Xiaomi’s upcoming lineup will be among the first handsets to come equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The Pro models will also sport a secondary display on the back, placed inside a rectangular camera module. Now, the company has officially confirmed the charging speed and display specifications of the soon-to-launch Xiaomi 17 Pro Max.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Max Display, Charging Specifications Confirmed Days Ahead of Launch

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival and Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale  offer a great opportunity to upgrade your smartphone without burning a hole through your pocket. Smartphones from brands such as iQOO, Lava, Oppo, Poco, and Redmi are available with discounts. In this article, we'll take a look at the best deals on smartphones under Rs. 10,000 on Amazon and Flipkart.
title: Amazon and Flipkart Sale 2025: Best Offers on Redmi A4 5G, Oppo K13x, and More Smartphones Under Rs. 10,000

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is now live for everyone. The sale event began for Prime members on Monday. During the sale event, the US-based e-commerce giant is offering several electronics like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, and PCs, at discounted prices. If you are looking to buy a new laptop, the company has also listed several deals on laptops from different categories, such as budget models, gaming laptops, and high-end performance models.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Laptops Under Rs. 30,000 From Asus, Acer, Lenovo and More

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale has kicked off in India with discounts on a wide range of product categories. Different popular smartphones like iQOO 13, OnePlus 13s, OnePlus 13s and more are listed with discounts on Amazon now. Here, we've included the handpicked best smartphone deals that you can get for under Rs. 50,000.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on iQOO 13, iPhone 15, OnePlus 13s and More Smartphones Under Rs. 50,000

description: Activision has revealed Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's multiplayer, detailing maps, modes, and other features coming to the game at launch and during its beta phase. The publisher also released a new multiplayer trailer and shared details on the beta, which begins in early access on October 2.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer Reveal Details Maps, Modes and Beta Content

description: Perplexity unveiled its new Email Assistant on Monday, marking its entry into workspace automation after July’s Comet browser launch. The AI-powered tool can draft responses, organise inboxes, and schedule meetings. At present, it supports Gmail and Outlook, but is limited to the $200 (roughly Rs. 17,700) per month Max subscription tier.
title: Perplexity Email Assistant With Agentic Capabilities Rolls Out to Max Subscribers

description: Oppo Find X9 leaks have been surfacing online for a while. Alleged renders of the upcoming handset had recently surfaced online, revealing the front design of the smartphone. Now, a company executive has officially shared a few images of the Oppo Find X9 series, showing its rear design and colourways. The Chinese smartphone maker recently announced that its next flagship phone, the Oppo Find X9, will debut in China in October.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Design, Colourways and Hasselblad-Tuned Cameras Revealed Ahead of October Launch

description: Samsung’s Fab Grab Fest 2025 brings festive deals across smartphones, laptops, tablets, wearables, TVs, and appliances. Buyers can get up to 53 percent off Galaxy smartphones, 59 percent off Galaxy Book laptops, and 50 percent off Galaxy Tabs and wearables, along with instant bank discounts of up to Rs. 20,000. TVs are offered at up to 51 percent off with free Soundbars or extra TVs. At the same time, refrigerators, washing machines, microwaves, and ACs come with up to 48 percent off, extended warranties, EMI options, and cashback up to Rs. 55,000.
title: Samsung Fab Grab Fest 2025 Brings Festive Deals With Discounts on Smartphones, Tablets, and Appliances in India

description: Vivo X300 series will be launched next month in China. Latest teasers by Vivo reveal that the Vivo X300 and X300 Pro will feature a Zeiss 2.35x telephoto zoom lens. This telephoto converter can be used to enhance the focal length of the telephoto camera. Both phones are confirmed to feature a 200-megapixel telephoto sensor and MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC.
title: Vivo X300, X300 Pro Will Feature a Zeiss 2.35x Telephoto Converter Just Like the Vivo X200 Ultra

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025 sale offers a good opportunity to upgrade to premium earphones and headphones from brands like Sony, Bose, Sennheiser, and JBL. The event, live for Prime members from September 22 and opening September 23 for others, also features discounts across smartphones, laptops, TVs, and more, along with bank offers and exchange deals.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Offers on TWS Earphones and Headphones

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) is developing a new spam solution to protect users against suspicious or fraudulent links, as per a report. The feature, dubbed Smart Link Protection, is said to leverage artificial intelligence (AI) to analyse and block malicious links in real time, preventing threat actors from tricking unsuspecting consumers. It is expected to function at the network level and does not require any manual intervention from the user, enabling them to continue using smartphones normally.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) to Reportedly Launch Smart Link Protection to Protect Users from Fraudulent Links

description: WhatsApp is testing a new feature which lets users mute 'everyone' mentions in group chats, as per a feature tracker. The in-development option is said to be available below the mute toggle in the notifications settings on WhatsApp for Android. It is currently under development and is not available even to beta testers who are registered via the Google Play Beta programme.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Testing Feature Which Lets Users Mute ‘Everyone’ Mentions in Group Chats
